special_text:
Whenever you discard a card, put a loyalty counter on Mishka. Then draw a card if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn.
[0]: Each player discards a card.
[-X]: Return target permanent card with mana value X or less from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control with a finality counter on it, except it's an X/X Illusion creature in addition to its other types.
